SETTINGS__SetPort_Description: Allows you to set the port on which the draw.io application will run (allowed range: 1024–65535)
SETTINGS__PercentDiagramsSize_Descriptio: If enabled, allows setting sizes in percentages, for example: ![[Diagram_1231237567.drawio.svg|75%]] or ![75%](Diagram_1231237567.drawio.svg), if the corresponding feature is enabled.
SETTINGS__InteractiveDiagrams_Descriptio: If enabled, makes diagrams interactive, allowing you to attach links to notes, links to external sources, and embed markdown snippets directly into the diagrams.
SETTINGS__MarkdownLinks_Description: If enable, links inserted after creating a diagram in the modal window will appear as markdown links – ![](Diagram_1231237567.drawio.svg)
SETTINGS__DefaultDiagramsSize_Descriptio: By specifying a value, it will automatically be applied to new diagrams created in the modal window. For example, if set to 100%, then – ![[Diagram_1231237567.drawio.svg|100%]], or if set to 700 – [[Diagram_1231237567.drawio.svg|700]]. (for percentage size, the corresponding option must be enabled)
